dialogues.text: (a mantra)  122 Get out, Tina, get out, Tina, get out, Tina... And then Tina jumps clear, rolls. She sits up, stares aft --the Tanker. Jill perched on top, flares blazing. Headin straight for the Gryphon, picking up speed--

dialogues.speaker: TINA
dialogues.text: Get out, mom, get out, mom, get out, mom... Jill waits--waits a little longer--then drops the flares the tanks and JUMPS-- She lands in a pile of full garbage bags. Tina runs to he --the truck roars toward the Gryphon. And then-- The Gryphon sidesteps. The truck passes between its legs. looks down, under itself, following the truck's passage.

dialogues.speaker: TINA
dialogues.text: Shit! It missed! The truck crashes into the fissure behind the Gryphon. Th Gryphon looks up--locks its stare on Jill and Tina.

dialogues.speaker: TINA
dialogues.text: Oh, shit... The Gryphon paces forward-- --Jill grabs Tina, dodges the swipe of a huge paw, pulls into an abandoned storefront. 109. The Gryphon's head looms huge in the shattered front wind reaches a paw in toward Jill and Tina, claws nearly reach them, backed into a narrow recess-- Suddenly, behind the Gryphon, the TRUCK EXPLODES-- --and IGNITES the GAS MAIN. Another EXPLOSION. The paveme roils like a WAVE. A MOVING WALL OF FLAME EXPLODES from t street, catching the Gryphon as it springs. Jill and Tina run for safety as the ground shakes, dodgin falling debris.

dialogues.speaker: TINA
dialogues.text: Goddammit, mom, you could've let  123 me in on your plan!

dialogues.speaker: JILL
dialogues.text: Stop cursing. ON GODZILLA: Fleer and Aaron grab for handholds.

dialogues.speaker: FLEER
dialogues.text: What the hell--? In the street, the Gryphon is trapped in a wall of flames panicked, screaming, trying desperately to spread its win It finally twists free, demolishing buildings on either s the street, its final SCREAM so ear-piercingly loud that shatter. The Gryphon, still afire, climbs into the sky, a falling reverse.

dialogues.speaker: AARON
dialogues.text: That's going to make our explosions look puny...

dialogues.speaker: FLEER
dialogues.text: It's not the size...it's how you use it. He sets the final charge in place. Looks up at Aaron. Aaron nods, rope in his hands, poised to leap off the dev Fleer pushes the buttons on both charges, then swings out Aaron's back. They step off into space, repelling down to terrace one hundred feet below. The timer counts down: 21, 20, 19... JILL AND TINA watch as the two figures drop down the rope The timer hits 13, 12, ll... Aaron's harness hits frayed line, tangles, freezes. Twent to go. He can't free the line.

dialogues.speaker: FLEER
dialogues.text: What's wrong?!

dialogues.speaker: AARON
dialogues.text: Frozen--I can't get it--  124

dialogues.speaker: FLEER
dialogues.text: Hit the release! The timer ticks off 7, 6, 5... Aaron yanks the release--he and Fleer drop from the rope-

dialogues.speaker: THE CHARGES EXPLODE--
dialogues.text: Aaron and Fleer hit the terrace hard--

dialogues.speaker: THE RESTRAINING DEVICE BLOWS FREE--
dialogues.text: Line begins pooling beside Aaron--his eyes widen. Looks u The restraining device tank FALLS DIRECTLY TOWARDS THEM-- They scramble for safety--Fleer grabs Aaron's collar, hau out of the way just as the device CRASHES to the terrace. They lie there, breathing hard-- And then the building shakes. And there is a ROAR. Godzilla is awake. He uses the building to haul himself u Aaron and Fleer get the hell out of there. They race down stairs as the building collapses around them. ON JILL AND TINA: as they run for the building.

dialogues.speaker: TINA
dialogues.text: Did they get out? Godzilla towers above them. He ROARS again. And above him Gryphon SCREAMS. Godzilla looks up. The Gryphon dives toward earth. Patches of its skin are blackened, still smoking. It fires a BOLT at Godzilla-- --who staggers, but does not fall. And then-- --Godzilla BREATHES FIRE, hits the Gryphon head on-- The Gryphon screams again, this time in pain, and veers o toward the East River. Godzilla ROARS again, and pounds away, giving chase. 111.  125

dialogues.speaker: TINA
dialogues.text: There they are! Aaron and Fleer emerge from the demolished building, supp each other, exhausted. But the tremors of Godzilla's exit dislodge a large, alre precarious sign; its bulk swings down toward the two men- They dive flat. The sign barely misses them, crashes to t ground. They lie there, unmoving. Jill and Tina reach the

dialogues.speaker: JILL
dialogues.text: Aaron--are you all right? Aaron?

dialogues.speaker: TINA
dialogues.text: (to Fleer) Are you okay, mister?

dialogues.speaker: AARON
dialogues.text: (eyes closed) Jill, Tina, Nelson Fleer. Nelson, Jill and Tina. Jill laughs out loud in relief. From the river comes a RO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pike comes to, battered, bleeding, lying inside the wreck section of his Apache. He unstraps himself. A weapons loc has sprung open; he grabs an M16. Using the rifle as a cr he climbs out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Gryphon gazes down. Below, Godzilla moves between buildings, slips into the East River. The Gryphon DIVES--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aaron, Jill, Fleer and Tina run. The street is plunged in DARKNESS by the shadow of the Gryphon, then back to light it passes. Jill pulls up short-- Pike is standing right there, holding the machine gun. Be him is the gaping entrance to the Brooklyn Battery Tunnel

dialogues.speaker: JILL
dialogues.text: Pike--you bastard--

dialogues.speaker: PIKE
dialogues.text: (levels the rifle) Please, Doctor. Calm down.  126 From the river comes a scream, a roar, the sounds of batt --and them the Gryphon SMASHES down on its back intolerab close to the group, the IMPACT knocking them off their fe The Gryphon twists to its feet-- Pike, frightened, sprays it with MACHINE GUN FIRE, pepper Gryphon. It reacts to the gnat-like irritation, spots Pik the others--

dialogues.speaker: TINA
dialogues.text: The tunnel! The Gryphon lashes out at them. They scramble for the tun

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The group runs into the tunnel, the Gryphon after them, a after mice. It tries to reach in after them, but its arm large. Pike, bringing up the rear, empties the M16 at it. Gryphon SNARLS. Opens its mouth-- Its TONGUE OF SNAKES lashes out, two of them catching Pik around the waist and leg.

dialogues.speaker: PIKE
dialogues.text: Help me! Aaron catches for his arm, but Pike is yanked away. He is dragged out of the tunnel, into the Gryphon's mouth. The Gryphon bites down-- Jill, Aaron, Tina and Fleer are shocked. Fleer spots a la tunnel utility truck. Gestures, leads them to it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Gryphon throws back its head, SWALLOWING PIKE. The Gr shuts its eyes--twitches involuntarily. From the distance Godzilla's ROAR. The Gryphon looks up at it. Glances around the area. Its fall on: THE RESTRAINING DEVICE TANK, lying in the street. Amnioti fluid leaks slowly from several cracks. The Gryphon scowls, narrows its eyes, as though trying to  127 remember something-- It does. It seems to smile. And then-- --THE GRYPHON ROLLS ITS HEAD, CRACKING ITS NECK--Pike's t exactly. The Gryphon pounces on the tank. It glances toward the Ea River. Clutching the tank in its front paws, the Gryphon to the skies--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The utility truck races through the tunnel, ramming throu abandoned cars. Fleer, at the wheel, hits the brakes. The truck slues to a stop. The entire width of the tunnel is blocked by a semi and trailer, halfway through an aborted turn.

dialogues.speaker: JILL
dialogues.text: I guess we walk. They climb out, hurry past the semi. On the wall is a sig "Brooklyn Battery Tunnel - MIDPOINT.'

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Over the bay, the Gryphon spots Godzilla. Heads for him, skimming above the water. Godzilla sees the Gryphon coming. Cocks his head to one s The Gryphon holds the tank in its paws, closing on Godzil Godzilla steps back, wary, almost looking for a place to to. The Brooklyn Bridge is behind him. He glances back at Gryphon-- The Gryphon squeezes the tank in anticipation. Metal howl strain. Amniotic fluid seeps out of the tank-- Godzilla sinks down into the water, seemingly afraid. Jus head visible above the water line-- Suddenly Godzilla BREATHES FIRE--not at the Gryphon, but THE WATER, creating a curtain of steam. An instant fog ba The Gryphon is blinded but can't pull up-- Godzilla dives-- The Gryphon screams, banks, suddenly flying blind-- And then THE BROOKLYN BRIDGE looms up out of the fog. The Gryphon HITS THE BRIDGE FULL SPEED. Tangles in the cablin  128 Drops the tank-- Godzilla erupts from the water, smashes into the Gryphon- The Gryphon tears one arm free from the cables. Reaches f the tank-- With an almost casual flip of his tail, Godzilla sends th flying out of the river, into Manhattan. The Gryphon SCRE frustration. The Gryphon twists, and Godzilla becomes tangled with som cables. The Gryphon snaps its wings open--a bio-electric scrabbles across them-- The cables are electrified. Godzilla is ELECTROCUTED. The Gryphon tears free, slams into the reeling Godzilla. Godz stumbles backward--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The tunnel SHAKES. Roof tiles come loose, clatter down. Aaron, Jill, Fleer and Tina freeze. Look up.

dialogues.speaker: FLEER
dialogues.text: Uh-oh. Another BOOM and cracks appear. Water begins to seep thro

dialogues.speaker: AARON
dialogues.text: I guess we run! They start running.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Godzilla has a deathlock on the Gryphon. The Gryphon flap furiously, straining with all its might. Both monsters ar lifted out of the water-- Godzilla twists around and BITES the Gryphon's WING, tear chunk out of it-- The monsters crash back into the water--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jill, Aaron, Fleer and Tina look back, over their shoulde In the distance, about a half-mile away, the roof of the  129

dialogues.speaker: CAVES IN--
dialogues.text: Godzilla's foot appears, crushing down from the ceiling-- Hundreds of thousands of gallons of water pour in past Go leg, gushing down from above. Tons of water, filling the tunnel, sweeping toward the foursome-- Jill spots an abandoned car--a red Subaru. Its door open.

dialogues.speaker: JILL
dialogues.text: In there! The ROAR of the approaching water is DEAFENING. They have seconds. They scramble for the car-- POV - THE WALL OF WATER, as it rushes toward them and the picking up speed--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aaron behind the wheel, Jill beside him, Fleer and Tina i back. They slam the doors shut--

dialogues.speaker: AARON
dialogues.text: Seat-belts! 115. They pull the shoulder belts across. Fleer frantically se for his latch--its buried in the seat. He digs it out. Th belt tongue goes in with a soft 'click!-- Just as the wall of water SLAMS INTO THE CAR--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Subaru is tossed like toy. It rolls. Twists. Is swept along, caroms off a police car All are shoved along by the immense force of the water. I washes over the cars, covering them, filling the tunnel--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The foursome are thrown violently, the seat-belts barely them in place. The vehicle is completely submerged. Some seeps in, but the passenger compartment for the most part Tina screams as a MAN'S FACE is driven hard against the s window, then washed away.  130

dialogues.speaker: FLEER
dialogues.text: Uh-oh. The BUMPER of a bottled-water TRUCK is visible, growing l in the windshield. They're hurtling toward it--

dialogues.speaker: DAY
dialogues.text: The angle of the two vehicles causes the Subaru to be shu one side, smashing in tight between the truck and the wal the tunnel. A violent, sudden STOP as the hood CRUMPLES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The foursome breath hard as they recover. Aaron straighte behind the wheel--and grimaces in pain, unnoticed by the There comes the loud CREAK of metal under stress. A small window CRACKS with gunshot suddenness. Water seeps throug cracks.

dialogues.speaker: FLEER
dialogues.text: We've got to equalize the pressure or it's going to crush us. Everyone-- crack your window a little bit. They do so. Water pours in. 116.

dialogues.speaker: FLEER
dialogues.text: Now we can open the doors to get out--

dialogues.speaker: AARON
dialogues.text: One problem. Jill looks over at him. Gasps. The steering wheel and dashboard have been torqued, pinning him. She leans acros tries to wrench the wheel up.

dialogues.speaker: JILL
dialogues.text: Dammit! Can you wiggle out?

dialogues.speaker: AARON
dialogues.text: No...not yet. The water in the car is waist level now--and rising. Flee leans across the seat. Together, he and Jill try to pull wheel up. Nothing.

dialogues.speaker: TINA
dialogues.text: Can you get the seat lever? Aaron reaches down, finds it--pulls it. A loud CLUNK. Fle tries to pull the seat back. No go.

dialogues.speaker: FLEER
dialogues.text: (straining) It feels like its just about to give-- Water is at their shoulders now.

dialogues.speaker: AARON
dialogues.text: Get out of here. All of you.

dialogues.speaker: JILL
dialogues.text: Don't be stupid.

dialogues.speaker: AARON
dialogues.text: You, either. Get out. He tilts his head back to breath. A final deep breath, an is submerged. The car is filled. UNDERWATER, Aaron indicates: 'get out.' Jill and Fleer, h their breath, keep trying to free him. He pushes them awa Tina looks on, frightened. She reaches for the door latch pushes the door open-- It hits the tunnel wall--and stops. She goes wide-eyed. P it a couple times. No go. Jill and Fleer exchange a glance. They try their doors. T are wedged shut by the bottled-water truck. Tina rolls her window all the way down--but the tunnel wa prevents her from wriggling out. The truck presents the s obstacle on the other side. Jill, Fleer and Aaron exchange a dismayed glance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Godzilla holds the Gryphon beneath the water. The Gryphon furiously. Levers its rear legs into Godzilla's belly, an 131  132 pushes, claws ripping flesh, shoving Godzilla back. The Gryphon surfaces, gasping for breath. It SLASHES its tips across Godzilla's eyes, and takes off. Godzilla hits with a BLAST OF FIRE as it moves away--

dialogues.speaker: DAY
dialogues.text: Aaron gets an idea. He reaches down and pulls the rear ha release. It pops open. The last air in the car evacuates large bubble. He indicates: 'GO!' Fleer shoves Tina out. Hesitates. Aaron gestures angrily. Fleer goes. Sadly, Jill takes Aaron's hand. A moment betw them. Jill looks away-- Through the windshield is the water bottle truck. There a capped, filled bottles. Bubbles pour out of uncapped, emp bottles, still in their racks. But several racks are empt Jill pushes away from Aaron, out of the car.

dialogues.speaker: DAY
dialogues.text: Fleer and Tina swim above the Subaru. The tunnel is illum by a weird combination of emergency lamps and headlights stabbing through the water. Jill swims up to them, lookin past them-- The ceiling is dark, unknowable. A leap of faith, then. She gestures ‘follow me' to Fleer Tina, and swims upward--

dialogues.speaker: DAY
dialogues.text: Aaron is not moving, conserving his breath. Only his eyes his panic. They dart from side to side. Tears well up. He clenches his jaw. His eyes roll back as his air runs out. mouth opens, a few last bubbles escaping-- Suddenly, Jill is there, swimming up to him-- --and KISSING HIM. Air bubbles rise up from their lips. A is shocked--realizes she has transferred air to him. Fleer is behind him then. Jill braces her feet on the das and pulls up at the wheel while Fleer strains against the Aaron twists--  133 --and comes free. The three swim out of the car.

dialogues.speaker: DAY
dialogues.text: Aaron follows Jill and Fleer toward the ceiling of the tu Tina waits for them, buoyed up against the tiles by the t large water bottles she is holding onto. They are capped, empty--except, of course, for air. At the base of one the made a pinhole, which Tina covers with her thumb. Aaron grins. Brilliant. Jill takes the pinholed bottle fr Tina--air bubbles stream up as they transfer it. Jill puts her mouth to the pinhole, takes a breath in demonstration. Holds the bottle out to Aaron. Their faces close together, he draws a deep breath, holding her gaze. intense moment between them. Tina, watching them, frowns, puzzled. What's going on the Then Jill smiles at him. Tilts her head toward the exit. smiles back, nods.

dialogues.speaker: DAY
dialogues.text: Each with a water bottle, the foursome half-swim, half-wa upside down on the ceiling, making their way toward the l the tunnel mouth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blood from Godzilla's wounds stains the water. Godzilla i it. He stands, not moving, staring into the sky, scanning much as he did in the Taki Islands. Then he stiffens--he' spotted something, a small dot in the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Gryphon, too, is wounded. Literally licking its wound flies slowly, circling Manhattan far below. It circles fa becoming more agitated-- It SCREAMS--and sweeps its wings back. It begins a power straight toward Godzilla.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Godzilla makes a slight sound at the back of his throat-- knows the Gryphon is coming. But he doesn't move. He wait  134 The Gryphon hurtles toward earth, claws bared, its speed its lips back in a viscous snarl-- Godzilla waits-- The Gryphon is nearly on Godzilla, screaming toward him--

dialogues.speaker: JAGGED DORSAL FINS ALONG HIS BACK--
dialogues.text: The Gryphon is RIPPED OPEN, from stem to stern. Both mons crash down into the river. A huge impact wave races in bo directions down the East River, flooding streets on eithe

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aaron emerges from the watery depths of the tunnel, into sunlight, Jill, Tina and Fleer right behind him. A number military vehicles, helicopters and personnel in the area. The foursome suck in air and hug in celebration--but then freezes. The others turn to see what he's staring at:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Godzilla shakily finds his footing. He tackles the Grypho struggles wildly, a wounded and vicious animal. It tries airborne. Godzilla grabs the Gryphon's tail, hauls it dow Godzilla levers his fingers into the Gryphon's rib cage a PULLS ITS BODY APART with a vicious CRACK-- Godzilla slams the Gryphon back into the river. He strikes like a snake, teeth glinting, jaws slamming sh beneath the water-- GODZILLA TEARS THE HEAD OFF THE GRYPHON, holds it up. Stares at it. Its eyes are closed. Its not moving-- And then the EYES SNAP OPEN-- --and the body ERUPTS from the water, clawing blindly at Godzilla even as it tries to repair itself. Godzilla BREA A STREAM OF FIRE into the body-- Like being microwaved, the body ignites from the inside-o --and EXPLODES. Hanging from Godzilla's hand, the head snarls and bites. Godzilla gives it an almost-exasperated look--  135 --and SPIKES the head on jagged remains of one of the tow Brooklyn Bridge. The head stops snapping. Weird blue eyes stare starkly. Godzilla leans close to it. Stares back. It is dead. Godzilla ROARS. Injured, bleeding from dozens of wounds, but triumphant, Godzilla begins pushing through the water, back to open s

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aaron realizes he's been holding his breath. Exhales in r

dialogues.speaker: TINA
dialogues.text: Is...is it over?

dialogues.speaker: JILL
dialogues.text: I think so. I hope so. Fleer stares out at the battleground. The river red with and ichor. The head staked atop the bridge.

dialogues.speaker: FLEER
dialogues.text: I don't care how much you pay me...I am not gonna help clean this up. Suddenly, from the sky comes a SCREAM--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is the SCREAM of fighter jets, streaking toward them.

dialogues.speaker: FLEER
dialogues.text: That's an attack formation... The jets FIRE. Missiles streak toward Godzilla-- IMPACT. Godzilla ROARS in pain. The jets streak past, banking to come around for another

dialogues.speaker: FLEER
dialogues.text: (yelling at the fighter)  136 Hey! Knock it off!

dialogues.speaker: AARON
dialogues.text: Jill--they can't--

dialogues.speaker: JILL
dialogues.text: I know. She looks around--and spots: A familiar Huey Helicopter.

dialogues.speaker: JILL
dialogues.text: You! The Huey Pilot turns--and is startled to see her. 121.

dialogues.speaker: HUEY PILOT
dialogues.text: Christ, I thought I was rid of you.

dialogues.speaker: JILL
dialogues.text: We need your helicopter.

dialogues.speaker: HUEY PILOT
dialogues.text: (laughs) Forget it. I told you--I don't have clearance--

dialogues.speaker: JILL
dialogues.text: I'm giving you the clearance--

dialogues.speaker: HUEY PILOT
dialogues.text: Screw you. Bring me up on charges, I don't care. No way I'm leaving the ground. There is the sound of a gun cocking-- Behind Jill, Tina has leveled her pistol at the pilot.

dialogues.speaker: TINA
dialogues.text: You really ought to listen to my mom. The Huey Pilot stares agog. Smiling, Fleer slips the pilo sidearm from its holster.

dialogues.speaker: BENEDEK
dialogues.text: 137 Tell Red Wing One to target its wounds specifically--and not let up! I want saturation fire!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The FIGHTER PILOT has Godzilla in his sites. Godzilla loo wounded and tired, showing a lot of the white of his eyes prepared to die.

dialogues.speaker: FIGHTER PILOT
dialogues.text: Roger that, Ground. Commencing strafing run--What the-- THE HUEY COPTER has risen up suddenly, between the fighte Godzilla.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The fighters veer aside, jetwash buffeting the rescue cop

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benedek has seen the action through binoculars.

dialogues.speaker: BENEDEK
dialogues.text: (into mic) Red Wing One, make another approach. Unidentified Copter, get the hell out of there! Do you copy?

dialogues.speaker: JILL, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: (filtered) We're not going anywhere, Benedek. Benedek stares at the speaker.

dialogues.speaker: BENEDEK
dialogues.text: Dr. Llewellyn?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Huey Pilot at the controls, nervously aware of Tina h the gun. Tina, not really paying attention, lets the barr her gun droop. Fleer lifts it back on line with a finger.  Jill is on the radio, Aaron beside her.

dialogues.speaker: JILL
dialogues.text: Benedek--call off the fighters!

dialogues.speaker: BENEDEK
dialogues.text: Don't be insane, Jill! Godzilla is weak, wounded--

dialogues.speaker: JILL
dialogues.text: We can't kill Godzilla.

dialogues.speaker: BENEDEK
dialogues.text: I say we can. Red Wing, target the creature. If the helicopter doesn't move, splash it!

dialogues.speaker: JILL
dialogues.text: Benedek, think! We couldn't have stopped the Gryphon without Godzilla. We know it came from space--how many more are there? Benedek starts to say something--pauses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The jet's computer targeting system locks on to the Huey, Godzilla beyond it.

dialogues.speaker: FIGHTER PILOT
dialogues.text: (into radio) We have a lock on the target.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benedek is torn.

dialogues.speaker: JILL
dialogues.text: (filtered) (vepeats it) How many more? It's a tough call for Benedek--but he reaches for the mic

dialogues.speaker: BENEDEK
dialogues.text: Red Wing One--break off attack. 138  139

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The jets sweep past the copter, then past Godzilla. Godzi watches them go by, then turns for the sea-- And COLLAPSES, suddenly just deadweight. He slowly sinks sight, unmoving. The water is stained pinkish by his bloo

dialogues.speaker: TINA
dialogues.text: Is it...is he dead?

dialogues.speaker: AARON
dialogues.text: I...don't know.

dialogues.speaker: FLEER
dialogues.text: Goddammit. We were too late. Jill stares sadly down at the ocean. She lowers her head.

dialogues.speaker: JILL
dialogues.text: (a whisper) no. (looks at Aaron) I guess I'm out of a job.

dialogues.speaker: AARON
dialogues.text: You and me both...

dialogues.speaker: TINA
dialogues.text: He's still out there, mom. 124.

dialogues.speaker: JILL
dialogues.text: (wanting to believe it) Yes...he's still out there. A pause.

dialogues.speaker: AARON
dialogues.text: So what do we do? Jill's response is simple: she puts an arm around Tina, d her close. A moment...then she puts out a hand to Aaron.. takes it. Together, they look out at the calm water.  140 And then Fleer spots something:

dialogues.speaker: FLEER
dialogues.text: (admiration) I knew he was a tough bastard. (points) Look! IN THE OCEAN: disturbing the surface is a V-shaped wake, by Godzilla's passage beneath the water. The wake becomes longer as he picks up speed and heads out toward open sea CAMERA DROPS TO BELOW THE WATER into the murky depths. Si Godzilla isn't there...but then we hear the characteristi BOOMING of Godzilla's heart. And as the screen FADES TO BLACK, we hear one last thing: GODZILLA'S DISTINCTIVE ROAR.
